h2. Billing
{{html:  <hr> }}
h3. Balance & Usage
{{html:

<div ng-app="myApp" ng-controller="BillingController">

<table class="table table-striped table-bordered"> 
<thead>
<tr><th>Available credit </th><th>Usage this month </th> </tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr><td> {[settings.credit | currency]} </td><td> $5.35  </td> </tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<hr>
<form class="form-horizontal" >
<fieldset>

<!-- Appended Input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="appendedtext">Add credit to your account</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <div class="input-append">
      <input type="number" class="input-mini" ng-model="addedAmount" min=1> 
      <span class="add-on">USD</span>
      <button class="btn" ng-click="add()">Add</button>
    </div>
    
  </div>
</div>

</fieldset>
</form>
<hr>
}}

h3. Billing History
{{html:
<table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Date</th>
            <th>Description</th>
            <th>Amount</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr ng-repeat="hist in settings.creditHistory">
            <td>{[hist.date]}</td>
            <td>{[hist.description]}</td>
            <td>{[hist.amount]}</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
</div>
}}
